title: Sheppard's dagger shot leads No. 23 Virginia Tech past Miami (FL) 70-63 - VT hokiesports.com
content: Sheppard's dagger shot leads No. 23 Virginia Tech past Miami (FL) 70-63  VT hokiesports.com
description: BLACKSBURG, VA --Aisha Sheppard hit a dagger 3-pointer with 1:03 left in the game to put Virginia Tech ahead 66-59, and the Hokies earned a 70-63 win over the Miami (FL) Hurricanes at home Thursday.
